name: gumroad
description: Gumroad simplifies selling digital goods, physical products, and memberships by offering a streamlined checkout, marketing tools, and direct payout options

tools.name: GUMROAD_GET_RESOURCE_SUBSCRIPTIONS
tools.description: Tool to show all active subscriptions of the user for the input resource. Use when you need to review existing webhooks before adding a new one.

inputSchema.title: GetResourceSubscriptionsRequest

resource_name.title: Resource Name
resource_name.description: Name of the resource to list subscriptions for. One of the eight supported event types.

inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving active subscriptions for a specific resource.

tools.name: GUMROAD_GET_SALES
tools.description: Tool to retrieve all successful sales by the authenticated user. Use when you need to list your Gumroad sales, optionally filtering by email, date range, product, or pagination.

inputSchema.title: GetSalesRequest

page.title: Page
page.description: Page number for paginated results; minimum is 1.

after.title: After
after.description: Only include sales after this ISO8601 date/time (e.g., '2023-01-01T00:00:00Z').

email.title: Email
email.description: Filter sales by customer email address.

before.title: Before
before.description: Only include sales before this ISO8601 date/time.

product_id.title: Product Id
product_id.description: Filter sales by a specific product ID.

inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving sales. All filters are optional; omit to fetch broadly.

tools.name: GUMROAD_GET_USER
tools.description: Tool to retrieve the authenticated user's data. Use when you need the current user's profile details after authentication.

inputSchema.title: GetUserRequest
inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving the authenticated user's data.

tools.name: GUMROAD_SUBSCRIBE_TO_RESOURCE
tools.description: Tool to subscribe to a resource. Use when you need to receive real-time event webhooks after creating your webhook endpoint.

inputSchema.title: SubscribeToResourceRequest

post_url.title: Post Url
post_url.description: Your endpoint URL that will receive HTTP POST notifications.

resource_name.title: Resource Name
resource_name.description: One of the eight supported Gumroad resources to subscribe to.

inputSchema.description: Request model for subscribing to a Gumroad resource to receive webhooks.

tools.name: GUMROAD_UNSUBSCRIBE_FROM_RESOURCE
tools.description: Tool to unsubscribe from a resource. Use after verifying the subscription ID exists to remove webhook.

inputSchema.title: UnsubscribeFromResourceRequest

resource_subscription_id.title: Resource Subscription Id
resource_subscription_id.description: Unique ID of the resource subscription to delete

inputSchema.description: Request parameters for unsubscribing from a Gumroad resource subscription.
